Articles.Content:
Although this forum is hell-ridden with critics who discuss pseudoscience, a thread dealing with creationism was surprisingly absent. So, I decided that one should be made for the entertainment of myself and the powers that be. You may discuss about the ups and downs of Creationism, praise or shun it, or just analyze and criticize it.

So, feel free to post.
Yeah.. lulz. If the thread I started wasn't allowed, this sure as heck won't be.
Ooooh. You should have said "Intelligent Design". That apparently "isn't tied to religion". *Cough*

...It seems that a topic directly relating to religion is not allowed, according to the forum members.

I guess it's better that way.
Pseudoscience is not allowed on the forum, sorry.

Pseudoscience is not allowed on the forum, sorry.

He doesn't want to discuss pseudoscience. He wants to discuss fairy-tales.

He doesn't want to discuss pseudoscience. He wants to discuss fairy-tales.

Not that I have a problem with people who don't agree with religion, but the "fairy tale" jab is as old as "Your mom" jokes.

((and this is exactly why they don't allow these kinds of threads))

Not that I have a problem with people who don't agree with religion, but the "fairy tale" jab is as old as "Your mom" jokes.

((and this is exactly why they don't allow these kinds of threads))

Yeah fair enough comment. It reads a bit harsher on a second glance.

Pseudoscience is not allowed on the forum, sorry.

No, no. Pseudoscience is allowed. I think as long as you frame it in a language that avoids rib-women and similar things then it should be ok. Just change the title to Intelligent Design. Creationism is explicitly religious, but intelligent design allegedly can also mean aliens.

No, no. Pseudoscience is allowed. I think as long as you frame it in a language that avoids rib-women and similar things then it should be ok. Just change the title to Intelligent Design. Creationism is explicitly religious, but intelligent design allegedly can also mean aliens.

We've been discussing the "Is our universe a simulation" concept for roughly a week now without it degrading into a poodoo-fest, and that certainly falls under the label of Intelligent Design.
Wow, you're right. I've never thought of it that way. I'll need to check it out.
2.2.b, guys. No "Discussions of a political, ideological or religious nature... "
